title: RHUB Communications Releases TurboMeeting Version 6.0 Web/Video/Audio Conferencing and Remote Support Appliances
text:
RHUB Communications, Inc. 
SAN JOSE, Calif. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- RHUB Communications, Inc., the leading provider of web/video/audio conferencing and remote support appliance technologies, today announced the release of TurboMeeting version 6.0. Release 6.0, adding significant value to real-time collaboration solutions with advanced video conferencing features and enhanced iPhone/Android solutions for mobile connectivity. 
Now, under the lastest release, users will be able to enjoy improved video conferencing features that will significantly enhance the visual experience, presentation display features, and participant engagement and interaction during online meetings. They will also be able to enjoy enhanced mobile connectivity and meeting management through iPhone and Android devices. 
The new features in TurboMeeting 6.0 include: HD Video Conferencing: with support for up to 30 HD Webcams per meeting. Resolution up to 1080p at 30 frames per second. The system supports multiple layout formats for the webcams, smooth resizing and one-click switching between desktop sharing and HD video conferencing. HD Telepresence: Support for up to 8 monitors to display up to 30 HD video cameras and desktop sharing. IOS Mobile Client: The new IOS App supports viewing of remote desktops, video and audio conferencing, remote control, and hosting or scheduling meetings for iPhone and iPad devices Android Mobile Client: The new Android App supports the same functions of IOS mobile clients. 
“The implementation of full, HD video conferencing and full mobile device support enables TurboMeeting to meet all of the Real-Time Collaboration needs of our customers,” said Larry Dorie, CEO of RHUB Communications. “Now with all of the 6.0 features, we are giving users a richer virtual experience that will further enhance their productivity and work performance, and, that will help enterprises yield more output in a very cost effective way.” 
“Our latest WebMetrics user surveys show that the use of video by web conferencing users has been increasing steadily year-over-year for the past seven years,” added Andy Nilssen, Sr. Analyst and Partner at Wainhouse Research. “In fact, for the first time ever, well over half (54%) of respondents indicate that they now use video in over 25% of their web conferences. Solutions like RHUB will cause this trend to continue by enabling users to experience how much value high quality video can truly add to their online meetings.” 
TurboMeeting is an award-winning on-premise appliance that allows workgroups to quickly host secure internal meetings with co-workers; for sales reps to quickly host sales presentations with clients; for thought leaders to facilitate educational webinars and training sessions; for IT pros to conduct remote support services to manage computer tech issues; and, for workers to remotely access the files on their desktop while on-the-go, plus so much more. 
Version 6.0 is available immediately. All appliances covered by the RHUB Enable warranty service can be updated immediately. For more information on TurboMeeting and RHUB Communications, visit www.rhubcom.com . 
About RHUB Communications 
RHUB Communications is a premier provider of real-time collaboration appliances for hosting on-premise web conferencing , video conferencing , audio conferencing , remote support , and remote access . RHUB has over two million end users in a variety of market segments including services, manufacturing, and government. For more information, visit www.rhubcom.com .
